name: Blanco - CO (Cigar Obsession) BG Reserve - Toro Barber Pole
additionalNotes: The BG Reserve is short for Bryan Glynn Reserve. It will be offered in four box-pressed vitolas, though one cigar is also a barberpole. Three of the sizes will use a Mexican San Andrés wrapper over an Indonesian Sumatran binder and fillers from Nicaragua. The BG Reserve Toro is a barberpole, meaning
